DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy of a low and high dose of a budesonide effervescent tablet and oral viscous budesonide suspension vs. placebo for the induction treatment of active eosinophilic esophagitis.
DOC.brief_title: Budesonide Effervescent Tablets vs. Viscous Budesonide Suspension vs. Placebo in Eosinophilic Esophagitis
